description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. radiangames Crossfire is an innovative and visually stunning shooter for one or two players.  Use your short-range warp drive to get behind the invaders from space and blow them away.  radiangames Crossfire is the second game in the radiangames series.
